long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates certain tasks on Procore to save time. 

* Autofills RFI email distribution message requesting costs from subcontractor OR with a custom user generated message
* Autofills RFI name & number when saving to local drive

Please contact me if you would like to see any additional features added.
